settings_schema.header:
The DependencyTrack plugin for Mattermost allows users to subscribe to DependencyTrack notifications, stay up-to-date with all the alerts generated on the DependencyTrack tool, and other common DependencyTrack actions - directly from Mattermost. 
 
 Instructions for setup are [available here](https://github.com/srkgupta/mattermost-plugin-dependency-track#configuration).
settings_schema.footer: * To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, [check the repository](https://github.com/srkgupta/mattermost-plugin-dependency-track).

settings.placeholder: Type the URL of the DependencyTrack tool

settings.help_text: Type the DependencyTrack API Token here. [Instructions available here](https://docs.dependencytrack.org/integrations/rest-api/)
settings.placeholder: Paste the DependencyTrack API Token here

settings.help_text: The secret used to authenticate the dependencyTrack webhook to Mattermost
settings.regenerate_help_text: Regenerates the secret for the webhook URL endpoint. Regenerating the secret invalidates your existing DependencyTrack integrations
